def Load(widget): Entity = widget.Entity
widget.View.Commands["CMD_BAIXARARQUIVO"].Visible = not(Entity == None or Entity["ARQUIVO"].IsNull) widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = (Entity["STATUS"].GetInt32() == 1) widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = (Entity["STATUS"].GetInt32() == 1)
